attributes.title: terrible!!!!

attributes.title: Tronald Jenius dump supporter
attributes.review: I was soooo exited to download this app and support our savior dump- I mean trump. But then the app came to life! It started screaming at me fake news! It even fired all my other apps! When I tried to walk downstairs, it said I was protesting- no rioting and called the FBI on me! The FBI took me and my phone to! After spending 69 days in Area 51 I was finally released. I deleted the app as soon as I got home. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!

attributes.title: Hate Speach
attributes.review: Not only is this app a horrible influence for our people but it is filled with hate speech and prejudice against our minority communities. This is not news, it is inaccurate and prejudice, take this off the news category! It is not a reliable source, not even close. When it comes to COVID-19, the trump campaign has directly caused people to die by spreading mis-information.
